mapper.select: SELECT distinct(p.pagenum), c.clicknum FROM notice n, pages p, clickpagenum c WHERE c.clicknum=1 AND p.pagenum Between c.startclicknum AND c.endclicknum AND n.notice_index BETWEEN p.startnum AND p.endnum Order by p.pagenum

SELECT distinct(p.pagenum), c.clicknum FROM notice n, pages p, clickpagenum c WHERE c.clicknum=2 AND p.pagenum Between c.startclicknum AND c.endclicknum AND n.notice_index BETWEEN p.startnum AND p.endnum Order by p.pagenum
